backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no logic.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing SEO and content-update features with affected files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of various frontend source files.
frontend/index.html: Main HTML entry file defining metadata, favicon, and root mounting point for the SPA.
frontend/public/robots.txt: Allows all crawlers and points to the sitemap URL.
frontend/public/sitemap.xml: Sitemap listing all primary site pages including tool URLs for SEO.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root router setup with layout, navigation, and route definitions for all tool and informational pages.
frontend/src/components/AdPlaceholder.ts: Placeholder component that renders nothing to avoid accidental ad insertion.
frontend/src/components/ErrorBoundary.ts: React error boundary that catches runtime errors and displays a reload prompt.
frontend/src/components/tools/LoadingInd: Small component showing a spinning loader and optional text.
frontend/src/components/tools/RelatedToo: Component displaying cards linking to related tools based on the current tool.
Reusable layout component that wraps tool UIs with headers, action buttons, loading state, results, and optional download button.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context, handling login, logout, and stored identity restoration via AuthClient.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles and CSS variables defining light/dark theme colors and global typography.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point initializing React, QueryClient, and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Displays information about SankalpHub's mission, offerings, and privacy approach.
frontend/src/pages/AllToolsPage.tsx: Shows a grid of all available tools with icons, descriptions, and navigation links.
frontend/src/pages/CalculatorsPage.tsx: Lists available calculator tools with icons and links in a grid layout.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Provides contact information including email and sections for business and support inquiries.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Landing page showing hero content and links to main tool categories with styled cards.
frontend/src/pages/ImageToolsPage.tsx: Displays a grid of image-related tools with icons and routes for compression, resizing, and conversion.
frontend/src/pages/NotFoundPage.tsx: Simple 404 page with message and buttons to navigate home or browse tools.
frontend/src/pages/PdfToolsPage.tsx: Lists available PDF tools such as merge, split, compress, and conversions using card-based navigation.
frontend/src/pages/PrivacyPolicyPage.tsx: Static privacy policy outlining data handling, file security, cookies, and policy changes.
frontend/src/pages/TermsPage.tsx: Static terms of service detailing usage rules, disclaimers, liability limits, and term updates.
frontend/src/pages/tools/calculators/Age: Interactive age calculator that computes age from birth date and displays results with related tools.
frontend/src/pages/tools/calculators/Bmi: BMI calculator that computes BMI from height and weight and shows category results and ranges.
frontend/src/pages/tools/calculators/Emi: Renders an EMI calculator page that takes loan inputs, calls calculateEmi, and displays EMI, total payment, and interest.
frontend/src/pages/tools/calculators/Gst: Provides a GST calculator allowing users to add or remove GST and shows GST amount and totals using calculateGst.
frontend/src/pages/tools/calculators/Loa: Implements a loan calculator UI that computes monthly payment, total payment, and interest via calculateLoan.
frontend/src/pages/tools/calculators/Per: Offers tools to compute percentages and percentage changes using calculatePercentage and calculatePercentageChange.
frontend/src/pages/tools/calculators/Sip: Builds a SIP calculator that calculates maturity value, invested amount, and gains based on monthly investments using calculateSip.
frontend/src/pages/tools/image/ImageComp: UI page for uploading an image, choosing compression quality, compressing it, and downloading the result.
frontend/src/pages/tools/image/ImageConv: Provides an interface to convert images between JPEG, PNG, and WebP formats and download the converted file.
frontend/src/pages/tools/image/ImageResi: Allows users to upload an image, input new dimensions, optionally maintain aspect ratio, resize it, and download the output.
frontend/src/pages/tools/image/JpgToPngP: Dedicated tool page for converting JPG/JPEG images to PNG and downloading the converted file.
frontend/src/pages/tools/image/PngToJpgP: UI for converting PNG files to JPG, showing progress and allowing download of the converted image.
frontend/src/pages/tools/pdf/CompressPdf: PDF compression tool page where users upload a PDF, trigger compression, view a summary, and download the compressed file.
frontend/src/pages/tools/pdf/ImageToPdfP: React page that lets users upload images, convert them to a PDF using createPdfFromImages, and download the generated file.
frontend/src/pages/tools/pdf/JpgToPdfPag: ToolShell-based JPG-to-PDF converter allowing multiple JPG uploads, PDF generation, error handling, and download.
frontend/src/pages/tools/pdf/PdfMergePag: UI for merging multiple PDFs using mergePdfs with validation, loading states, and a downloadable merged file.
frontend/src/pages/tools/pdf/PdfSplitPag: PDF splitting tool where users select a file and page range, invoke splitPdf, and download the resulting segment.
frontend/src/pages/tools/pdf/PdfToImageP: Page enabling PDF-to-image conversion via pdfToImage with upload, processing states, and image archive download.
frontend/src/routes.ts: Central route map defining paths for home, tools, calculators, and specific PDF/image utilities.
frontend/src/utils/calculators.ts: Provides functions for age, GST, EMI, loan, and BMI calculations with validation.
frontend/src/utils/download.ts: Handles browser blob downloads and generates timestamped filenames.
frontend/src/utils/format.ts: Offers helpers for formatting bytes, numbers, and computing percentage reduction.
frontend/src/utils/image.ts: Implements image loading, compression, resizing, and format conversion utilities.
frontend/src/utils/pdf.ts: Contains demo PDF utilities for creating, merging, splitting, compressing, and converting PDFs.
frontend/src/utils/seo.ts: Defines SEO titles and descriptions for various routes and tools.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures TailwindCSS theme, colors, typography, animations, and plugins.
frontend/VERIFICATION_CHECKLIST.md: Checklist ensuring priority tool URLs load correctly, refresh properly, and include correct SEO metadata.
project_state.json: Defines the projectâ€™s SEO-only optimization scope, constraints, existing features, and pending request for updating metadata and intro copy on specified tool pages excluding EMI and Loan calculators.
